Package gw.api.database

Interface IInsertSelectBuilder

public interface IInsertSelectBuilder
Performs an Insert-Select

  • Method Details

    • withInsertHint

      IInsertSelectBuilder withInsertHint(boolean withInsertHint)
      Whether to append NOLOG hint in the generated SQL (Oracle only). This behavior may be turned off globally in the configuration.
      Returns:
      this

    • withParallelDml

      IInsertSelectBuilder withParallelDml(boolean useParallelDml)
      Use parallel DML when executing this statement (Oracle only). This behavior may be turned off globally in the configuration by setting the ora-parallel-dml attribute on the upgrade element to "disable". It may also be overridden with the parallel-dml attribute of the versiontrigger element.
      Parameters:
      useParallelDml - whether to use Oracle parallel DML when executing this statement.
      Returns:
      this

    • addOptimizer

      IInsertSelectBuilder addOptimizer(QueryOptimizer optimizer)
      Add the given query optimizer to be executed when this insert-select is executed.
      Parameters:
      optimizer - query optimizer to use when building the query plan in the database.
      Returns:
      this

    • mapColumn

      IInsertSelectBuilder mapColumn(IEntityPropertyInfo targetColumn, Object source)
      Maps the value of the target column to the value of the source
      Parameters:
      targetColumn - target column
      source - Source can be a property on the source entity type, a ColumnRef, a DBFunction or an Object.
      Returns:
      this

    • withDescription

      IInsertSelectBuilder withDescription(String descriptionForTheQuery)
      Sets a string describing the query. Useful for debugging performance issues.
      Returns:
      this

    • getSourceQuery

      IQueryBuilder getSourceQuery()
      Returns:
      the query used for the source

    • withLogSQL

      IInsertSelectBuilder withLogSQL(boolean logSQL)
      Turns on or off SQL logging. The query is logged to the PLLoggerCategory.SERVER_DATABASE log category at the info level
      Parameters:
      logSQL - true to log SQL, false to not
      Returns:
      the this ptr

    • execute

      int execute()
      Executes the query. If already in a transaction, the query executes in that transaction; otherwise a new transaction is created and committed when the method returns, or rolled back if the method throws an exception. The statement that is constructed will perform default behavior for the following fields (if present and not mapped):- ID (keyable beans only): using new keys from the KeyGenerator PublicID (keyable beans only): using a new value from the PublicIDGenerator BeanVersion (versionable beans only): 0 CreateTime (editable beans only): current time CreateUser (editable beans only): the current user UpdateTime (editable beans only): current time UpdateUser (editable beans only): the current user Retired (retireable beans only): 0 Columns with default values that are not mapped will be inserted with their default values.
      Returns:
      the number of rows affected
